text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian, though still pre-debut,<n>secures a place in the
exalted Sprout<n>Kinen. It's an amazing<n>accomplishment and
the talk of the<n>academy.

The exhibition race will be held at the<n>Tokyo Racecourse,
where most<n>legendary runners first come to<n>prominence.

I'm sure many are eager with<n>excitement to see the Beast
in action.<n>However, the unforeseen happens...

Biwa Hayahide is called by student<n>council president
Symboli Rudolf for an<n>urgent meeting.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You want me to race on her behalf?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What... what is the meaning of this,<n>President?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I understand that this is sudden and a<n>lot to process. We are
just as<n>thunderstruck as you are.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But the reality is this... Narita Brian<n>has come down with a
fever.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The racer chosen to take her place in<n>the Sprout Kinen is
you. So I ask again,<n>Biwa Hayahide, will you heed the<n>
call?

This is her chance. If she can race<n>against top runners in the
Sprout<n>Kinen, it should help her get closer to<n>completing
the winning equation.
Knowing that, I encourage her to join.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Impossible. I'm not at that<n>level—Brian's level.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm no replacement for her!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I disagree. You—

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I know her capabilities more than<n>anyone!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, I lost my composure.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm worried about Brian's condition.<n>Before I make any
decisions, I would<n>like to go see my sister.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Of course. I apologize for not giving<n>due consideration.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
However... there is, frankly, no time to<n>spare. I expect your
decision soon.

Hayahide is anxious as we go to<n>check on Narita Brian. At
the hospital,<n>we're told the ailing racer has just<n>taken
some medicine and fallen<n>asleep.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
She looks terrible. I'm always telling<n>her to take better care
of herself, but<n>she never listens...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's the exact opposite of before.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It was a long time ago.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Her physical abilities began to<n>surpass mine. No longer able
to keep<n>up, I started training recklessly.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But my sister—even though she was<n>so young—was worried
about me. And<n>one day, while we were playing tag...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I should've treated it as a friendly<n>game between sisters,
as a proper<n>older sibling would.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
No. No matter how fast I ran, I was<n>unable to catch up to her.
I grew more<n>and more desperate, eventually<n>neglecting to
watch where I was<n>going... I crashed into a fence and<n>
wound up in the hospital.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
While I was completely bedridden,<n>Brian kept improving her
speed on her<n>own.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But I couldn't move—all I could do<n>was use my head. That's
when I<n>began to persist in my studies.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In bed, I sank myself into my notes<n>and books, constructing
theories day<n>in and day out. I even gave one the<n>grand
title of the "winning equation."

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But... You know what, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Not once in all this time have I ever<n>been able to predict
Narita Brian and<n>her pure instincts.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: She always exceeds my calculations.She destroys all my equations. She'san anomaly that I cannot solve!

Her words are filled with suffering...<n>And I realize she's
been holding this<n>pain inside the whole time.

No matter how hard she thinks, the<n>Beast always bests her
theories. But<n>even now, she pushes on, always<n>planning
and formulating.
choice_data_list: And that's how you gained your unique ability.
And that's how you gained your unique ability.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list: Your theories are an unrivaled force.
Your theories are an unrivaled force.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I told you, I've never been accurate<n>when it comes to Brian.
No matter how<n>hard I try, I'll never surpass her!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I still haven't been able to prove any<n>of my theories—

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: You? How so?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In tomorrow's race, I'll stay near the<n>lead until the final
corner. The front<n>pack will be tightly grouped together.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Following the last turn, I'll pass them<n>from outside.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Then I will gain a lead of no less than<n>ten lengths—and place
first.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Three... two... one.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Time to confirm my calculations!

I still remember how my chest<n>pounded with excitement
back then.

The way she talked about her<n>calculations made my heart
dance. I<n>couldn't help but want to work<n>together and bring
her theories to<n>fruition!

I was completely captivated by her<n>brilliant winning
equation!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Trainer...
choice_data_list:
Let's solve your equation and seize
victory—together.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Why? Do you truly believe that I can<n>reach her level?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: He's not the only one who believes<n>in you.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: She's not the only one who believes<n>in you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: President!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
There's something of vital<n>importance that I forgot to tell
you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Vital importance?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes, the one who so strongly<n>recommended you above all
others as<n>Narita Brian's replacement...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —was Narita Brian herself. She said itmust be you.

Biwa Hayahide gasps in total shock,<n>but her expression
quickly shifts to<n>one filled with determination.
She is ready to do what's necessary.
